wblut.hemesh.modifiers
Class HEM_Bend

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Modifier
      wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Bend
All Implemented Interfaces:
HE_Manipulator
public class HEM_Bend
extends HEM_Modifier

Bend a mesh. Determined by a ground plane, a bend axis and an angle factor.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
